channel.title: New Client Help!
channel.description:
On the Client I need help with the Magic Icons, that are in the spell book.
Like when I have specific runes for the Spell, The Spell Glows on the Spell book.
But when I don't have the Specific Runes for it, How do I make them not glow anymore?
Please if anyone could help that would be awsome.
